New Records: Shubman Gill scored a record-breaking century.
India registered the biggest win margin in T20I history with a 168-run victory.
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill was named Player of the Match for his excellent century.
Hardik Pandya delivered a magical spell contributing significantly to the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya credited the support staff for the team's performance and downplayed his influence.
This match marked India's last T20I for a while as the focus will shift to other formats.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The curator was sacked following the second T20I pitch debacle.
The surface in the second T20I offered a lot of turn to spinners, leading to criticism.
